A`FieldAttributes`值可以包含一個以上的屬性，例如`Public`和`Literal`，第三個欄位中所示。A `FieldAttributes` value can contain more than one attribute, such as both `Public` and `Literal`, as shown in the third field. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會提供 managed 的編譯器和程式碼分析器的設計工具。This method is provided for designers of managed compilers and code analyzers. 這個方法可以用於執行內容和僅限反映的內容。This method can be used in both the execution context and the reflection-only context. 未受管理的中繼資料中的 Constant 資料表用來儲存常數值的欄位、 參數和屬性。In unmanaged metadata, the Constant table is used to store constant values for fields, parameters, and properties. 常數的資訊不會直接影響執行階段行為。Constant information does not directly influence runtime behavior. 編譯器會檢查這項資訊，在編譯時期，當匯入中繼資料。Compilers inspect this information, at compile time, when importing metadata. 如果使用，則編譯器會發出 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) 資料流中內嵌常數的值。If used, the value of a constant is embedded in the Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) stream the compiler emits. 有可用來在執行階段存取的 Constant 資料表不 MSIL 指令。There are no MSIL instructions that can be used to access the Constant table at run time. > [!NOTE] > 如需有關常數的值和常數的資料表的詳細資訊，請參閱 ECMA 第二篇文件。For more information on constant values and the Constant table, see the ECMA Partition II documentation. 您可以線上取得這份文件；請參閱 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和通用語言基礎結構標準](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)，以及 Ecma International 網站上的[標準 ECMA-335 - 通用語言基礎結構 (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site.

param.name: obj
param.span: 將傳回其欄位值的物件。

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，傳回指定物件所支援欄位的值。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns the value of a field supported by a given object.

returns.span: 物件，包含這個執行個體所反映欄位的值。

span.span: An object containing the value of the field reflected by this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果欄位是靜態的`obj`會被忽略。If the field is static, `obj` is ignored. 對於非靜態欄位，`obj`應繼承或宣告欄位類別的執行個體。For non-static fields, `obj` should be an instance of a class that inherits or declares the field. 傳回類型的附註`GetValue`是`Object`。Note that the return type of `GetValue` is `Object`. 比方說，如果基本的欄位保留為布林值的執行個體`Object`使用適當的布林值會傳回值。For example, if the field holds a Boolean primitive value, an instance of `Object` with the appropriate Boolean value is returned. 傳回值之前,`GetValue`檢查使用者是否具有存取權限。Before returning the value, `GetValue` checks to see if the user has access permission. > [!NOTE] > 完全信任程式碼會略過存取限制。Access restrictions are ignored for fully trusted code. 也就是私用建構函式、 方法、 欄位和屬性可以存取和完全信任程式碼時，透過反映叫用。That is, private constructors, methods, fields, and properties can be accessed and invoked through reflection whenever the code is fully trusted. > [!NOTE] > 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，這個方法可以用來存取非公用成員，如果呼叫者已授與使用旗標，並限制為呼叫端的非公用成員的授權集是否授與集或子集效果。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this method can be used to access non-public members if the caller has been granted with the flag and if the grant set of the non-public members is restricted to the caller's grant set, or a subset thereof. (請參閱[反映的安全性考量](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。)(See [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md).) > > 若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應將目標設為 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] (含) 以後版本。To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法來擷取靜態欄位的值。The following example uses the method to retrieve the value of a static field. 請注意，值`obj`引數是`null`。Note that the value of the `obj` argument is `null`. [!code-cpp[getfldval#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/GetFldVal/CPP/getfldval.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[getfldval#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/GetFldVal/CS/getfldval.cs#1)] [!code-vb[getfldval#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/GetFldVal/VB/getfldval.vb#1)] 下列範例會擷取陣列物件，表示的欄位`FieldsClass`類型，然後呼叫來顯示每個欄位的值`fieldsInst`物件。The following example retrieves an array of objects that represents the fields of the `FieldsClass` type, and then calls the to display the value of each field for the `fieldsInst` object. summary.span: 取得值，指出 是否描述此欄位的潛在可視性；亦即，最多只有相同組件 (Assembly) 中的其他型別可以看見該欄位，組件外部的衍生型別 (Derived Type) 則看不見它。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 欄位的實際的可見性受限於其類型的可見性。The actual visibility of a field is limited by the visibility of its type. 屬性可能是`true`欄位，但如果它是私用巢狀類型的欄位則包含類型外部看不到 欄位。The property might be `true` for a field, but if it is a field of a private nested type then the field is not visible outside the containing type. 藉由完全描述欄位的可視性唯一的可視性修飾詞是否`internal`(`Friend` Visual Basic 中)。The visibility of a field is exactly described by if the only visibility modifier is `internal` (`Friend` in Visual Basic). 這個屬性是`false`之欄位的`protected internal`C# 中 (`Protected Friend`在 Visual Basic `protected public` c + + 中); 使用來識別這類欄位的屬性。This property is `false` for fields that are `protected internal` in C# (`Protected Friend` in Visual Basic, `protected public` in C++); use the property to identify such fields. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會定義欄位具有不同的層級的可見性，並顯示的值及其， ， ，和屬性。The following code example defines fields with varying levels of visibility, and displays the values of their , , , and properties. > [!NOTE] > Visual Basic 和 C# 語言不能定義欄位可見性; 的存取層級只會出現在 c + + 範例。The Visual Basic and C# languages cannot define fields with visibility; that access level appears only in the C++ example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 公用欄位都可以存取所有位置相對應的類別為可見。Public fields are accessible everywhere their corresponding classes are visible. `IsPublic`屬性時，會設定`FieldAttributes.Public`屬性設定。The `IsPublic` property is set when the `FieldAttributes.Public` attribute is set. 若要取得`IsPublic`屬性，第一次取得類別`Type`。To get the `IsPublic` property, first get the class `Type`. 從`Type`，取得`FieldInfo`。From the `Type`, get the `FieldInfo`. 從`FieldInfo`，取得`IsPublic`屬性。From the `FieldInfo`, get the `IsPublic` property. 如果欄位為公用以外，它受保護，而且無法輕易地存取。If the field is other than public, it is protected and cannot be readily accessed. 若要存取非公用欄位，設定`BindingFlags`來`NonPublic`，指定`BindingFlags.Instance`或是`BindingFlags.Static`，並使用此項目，`GetField`方法。To access a nonpublic field, set the `BindingFlags` to `NonPublic`, specify either `BindingFlags.Instance` or `BindingFlags.Static`, and use this for the `GetField` method. ## Examples 下列範例會傳回值，指出類別的欄位為 public 或 private。The following example returns a value indicating whether or not the field of the class is public or private. [!code-cpp[Classic FieldInfo.IsPublic Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FieldInfo.IsPublic Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic FieldInfo.IsPublic Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FieldInfo.IsPublic Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic FieldInfo.IsPublic Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FieldInfo.IsPublic Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示目前欄位在目前信任層級上是否為安全性關鍵或安全性安全關鍵。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the current field is security-critical or security-safe-critical at the current trust level.

value.span: 如果目前欄位在目前信任層級上為安全性關鍵或安全性安全關鍵，則為 ，如果是透明，則為 。

span.span: if the current field is security-critical or security-safe-critical at the current trust level; if it is transparent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ， ，和屬性報告在其目前信任層級，由 common language runtime (CLR) 欄位的透明度。The , , and properties report the transparency level of the field at its current trust level, as determined by the common language runtime (CLR). 下表顯示這些屬性的組合：The combinations of these properties are shown in the following table: |安全性層級Security level|IsSecurityCriticalIsSecurityCritical|IsSecuritySafeCriticalIsSecuritySafeCritical|IsSecurityTransparentIsSecurityTransparent| |--------------------|------------------------|----------------------------|---------------------------| |CriticalCritical|`true`|`false`|`false`| |安全關鍵Safe critical|`true`|`true`|`false`| |透明Transparent|`false`|`false`|`true`| 使用這些屬性會比檢查組件和型別和成員的安全性註釋、 檢查目前的信任層級，以及嘗試複製執行階段規則更簡單。Using these properties is much simpler than examining the security annotations of an assembly and its types and members, checking the current trust level, and attempting to duplicate the runtime's rules. > [!IMPORTANT] > 部分信任組件，這個屬性的值取決於目前的組件的信任層級。For partial-trust assemblies, the value of this property depends on the current trust level of the assembly. 如果組件載入至部分信任的應用程式網域 （例如，為沙箱化應用程式網域），執行階段會略過組件的安全性註釋。If the assembly is loaded into a partially trusted application domain (for example, into a sandboxed application domain), then the runtime ignores the security annotations of the assembly. 組件及其所有類型中視為透明。The assembly and all its types are treated as transparent. 執行階段在該組件會載入至完全信任的應用程式網域 （例如，載入預設應用程式定義域的桌面應用程式） 時，才支付注意部分信任組件的安全性註釋。The runtime pays attention to the security annotations of a partial-trust assembly only when that assembly is loaded into a fully trusted application domain (for example, into the default application domain of a desktop application). 相較之下，信任的組件 （也就是強式名稱組件安裝在全域組件快取中） 會一律載入以完全信任，無論信任層級的應用程式定義域中，因此其目前的信任層級永遠都是完全受信任。By contrast, a trusted assembly (that is, a strong-named assembly that is installed in the global assembly cache) is always loaded with full trust regardless of the trust level of the application domain, so its current trust level is always fully trusted. 您可以使用，以判斷目前的信任層級的組件和應用程式定義域和屬性。You can determine the current trust levels of assemblies and application domains by using the and properties. 如需有關反映和透明度的詳細資訊，請參閱[反映的安全性考量](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。For more information about reflection and transparency, see [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md). 投影片的相關資訊，請參閱[安全性變更](~/docs/framework/security/security-changes.md)。For information about transparency, see [Security Changes](~/docs/framework/security/security-changes.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 靜態欄位時，欄位的一份由類型的所有執行個體共用。When a field is static, one copy of the field is shared by all instances of the type. `IsStatic`屬性時，會設定`FieldAttributes.Static`屬性設定。The `IsStatic` property is set when the `FieldAttributes.Static` attribute is set. 若要取得`IsStatic`屬性，第一次取得類別`Type`。To get the `IsStatic` property, first get the class `Type`. 從`Type`，取得`FieldInfo`。From the `Type`, get the `FieldInfo`. 從`FieldInfo`，取得`IsStatic`屬性。From the `FieldInfo`, get the `IsStatic` property. 若要存取非公用欄位，設定`BindingFlags`要`NonPublic`中`GetField`方法和協助工具設定為`Instance`或`Static`。To access a non-public field, set the `BindingFlags` to `NonPublic` in the `GetField` method and set the accessibility to `Instance` or `Static`. ## Examples 下列範例會判斷指定的欄位是否為靜態，並顯示結果。The following example determines whether the specified field is static and displays the result. [!code-cpp[Classic FieldInfo.IsStatic Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FieldInfo.IsStatic Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic FieldInfo.IsStatic Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FieldInfo.IsStatic Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic FieldInfo.IsStatic Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FieldInfo.IsStatic Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 此程式碼會產生下列輸出：This code produces the following output: Reflection.FieldInfoReflection.FieldInfo Myfielda-私用欄位;IsStatic-FalseMyfielda - A private field; IsStatic - False Myfieldb-B 靜態欄位;IsStatic-TrueMyfieldb - B static field; IsStatic - True

summary.span: 設定指定物件所支援的欄位值。

span.span: Sets the value of the field supported by the given object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會將指派`value`在物件上的這個執行個體所反映欄位`obj`。This method will assign `value` to the field reflected by this instance on object `obj`. 如果欄位是靜態的`obj`將會被忽略。If the field is static, `obj` will be ignored. 對於非靜態欄位，`obj`應繼承或宣告欄位類別的執行個體。For non-static fields, `obj` should be an instance of a class that inherits or declares the field. 新的值被當做`Object`。The new value is passed as an `Object`. 例如，如果欄位的類型為布林值，執行個體`Object`值會傳遞適當的布林值。For example, if the field's type is Boolean, an instance of `Object` with the appropriate Boolean value is passed. 設定值之前,`SetValue`檢查使用者是否具有存取權限。Before setting the value, `SetValue` checks to see if the user has access permission. 此最後一個的方法是很便利的方法來呼叫下列`SetValue`方法。This final method is a convenience method for calling the following `SetValue` method. > [!NOTE] > 完全信任程式碼具有的權限，才能存取及叫用私用建構函式、 方法、 欄位和使用反映的屬性。Fully trusted code has the permissions that are needed to access and invoke private constructors, methods, fields, and properties using reflection. > [!NOTE] > 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，這個方法可以用來存取非公用成員，如果呼叫者已授與使用旗標，並限制為呼叫端的非公用成員的授權集是否授與集或子集效果。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this method can be used to access non-public members if the caller has been granted with the flag and if the grant set of the non-public members is restricted to the caller's grant set, or a subset thereof. (請參閱[反映的安全性考量](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。)(See [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md).) > > 若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應將目標設為 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] (含) 以後版本。To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later. ## Examples 下列範例設定欄位的值、 取得和顯示的值，修改欄位，並顯示結果。The following example sets the value of a field, gets and displays the value, modifies the field, and displays the result. [!code-cpp[FieldInfo_SetValue#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/FieldInfo_SetValue/CPP/fieldinfo_setvalue.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[FieldInfo_SetValue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/FieldInfo_SetValue/CS/fieldinfo_setvalue.cs#1)] [!code-vb[FieldInfo_SetValue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/FieldInfo_SetValue/VB/fieldinfo_setvalue.vb#1)]
